name: js-crypto-rsa
description: Universal Module for RSA Cryptography (RSA-OAEP and RSASSA-PSS/PKCS1-V1_5) in JavaScript

scripts.test:bundle: yarn webpack && cross-env TEST_ENV=bundle yarn test
scripts.karma:bundle: yarn webpack && cross-env TEST_ENV=bundle karma start
scripts.karma:window: yarn webpack && cross-env TEST_ENV=window karma start
scripts.html: yarn webpack && yarn html:source && yarn html:bundle && yarn html:window
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn tsc && yarn webpack:prod
scripts.analyze: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --optimize-minimize --json --config webpack.prod.js | webpack-bundle-size-analyzer

author: Jun Kurihara
